Reference

coo_*

Modify coordinates

coo_align()

Align shapes

coo_center()

Center shapes

coo_list() is_coo_list() is_coo_list1()

coo_list constructor for list of shapes

coo_rotate()

Rotate shapes

coo_rotatecenter()

Rotate shapes and specify center

coo_sample() coo_interpolate()

Sample shapes

coo_scale()

Scale shapes

coo_single() validate_coo_single() is_coo_single() is_coo_single1()

coo_single constructor for single shapes

coo_tbl() is_coo_tbl() is_coo_tbl1()

coo_tbl class

coo_template()

Templates shapes

coo_trans()

Translate shapes

get_*

Describe coordinates

get_centpos()

Calculate centroid position

get_centsize()

Calculate centroid size

get_lw() get_length() get_width()

Calculates length and width of a shape

get_perim_along() get_perim() get_perim_cumsum()

Calculates perimeter and variations

get_range() get_range() get_diffrange()

Get shape range

Morphometrics

Functions that turn coordinates into coefficients

efourier() efourier_i() efourier_norm()

elliptical Fourier transforms

Momocs verbs

Mostly to ease manipulation of list columns

pick()

Pick a single coo_df from a coo_tbl

unpack()

Unpack list columns

plint()

Plot, print and pipe forward

Graphics

Prepare and build ggplot2 graphics

gg() gg0()

Default ggplot2 graphics

draw()

Add shapes on top of another plot

inspect()

Graphical inspection of shapes

mosaic()

Plot all shapes as a mosaic

pile()

Plot all shapes on the same graph

Morphospaces

Prepare and build morphospaces

morphospace()

Versatile function to reconstruct shapes from statistical objects

Classes

Classes constructors, validators

coo_single() validate_coo_single() is_coo_single() is_coo_single1()

coo_single constructor for single shapes

coo_list() is_coo_list() is_coo_list1()

coo_list constructor for list of shapes

coo_tbl() is_coo_tbl() is_coo_tbl1()

coo_tbl class

coe_single() validate_coe_single() is_coe_single() is_coe_single1()

coe_single constructor for single coefficients lists

coe_list() is_coe_list() is_coe_list1()

coe_list constructor for list of shapes

is_coe_tbl() is_coe_tbl1() coe_tbl()

coe_tbl class

Babel

Helpers to convert from/to different formats

Datasets

To play with

bot2

Some bottles
